summary: Completed comprehensive testing of E1 Analytics data analytics platform. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working well with minor issues in advanced analytics integration.

integration_issues.issue: Trend analysis, anomaly detection, and forecasting API calls returning 422 errors

passed_tests: Data cleaning operations (remove duplicates, fill missing values)
Homepage loads with correct stats (0 datasets initially)
Data preparation page with dataset selection
Analytics dashboard with charts (bar, line, area, statistics table)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend-backend integration for advanced analytics endpoints in Insights page. The frontend is sending requests that result in 422 errors for trends, anomalies, and forecasting APIs. Check request payload format and ensure proper parameter passing.
